plugins.name: AI DesignGen: Prompt-to-Design Magic
plugins.description:
Overview:

Supercharge your design workflow with our AI-powered Figma plugin that generates fully editable UI components from plain English prompts. Whether you're wireframing an app, designing a landing page, or exploring layout ideas, this plugin helps you go from idea to visual in just one click. No more blank canvases ‚Äî just type, generate, and iterate.


Built for designers, developers, and product teams who want to move faster and smarter.


Call to Action‚òéÔ∏è

For support issues: Slack Twitter Email Codia.AI


Key Features:

1. Prompt-to-Design Magic

Type what you want ‚Äî "a modern login page," "a pricing section with three plans," or "a mobile navbar" ‚Äî and watch the plugin instantly generate a tailored UI layout in Figma.


2.Fully Editable Components

Every design is natively built in Figma using auto layout, proper naming, and editable styles, so you can customize it immediately without breaking the structure.


3.Style-Aware Generation

Add your own design tokens or themes and the AI will follow your brand colors, fonts, and spacing ‚Äî ensuring consistency across your designs.


4.Smart Iteration

Need a variation? Just refine your prompt or click ‚ÄúRegenerate‚Äù to explore alternative versions instantly, helping you ideate faster and more creatively.


5. Drag-and-Drop Optimization: Enhance AI-generated designs with intuitive drag-and-drop functionality. Refine layouts, edit elements directly within Figma, and tailor the design to your exact needs without the learning curve.


6. Advanced Palette and Theme Capabilities: Codia AI doesn't just design; it stylizes. With advanced palette and theme options, create a personalized design system that resonates with your brand identity and aesthetic preferences.


How It Works:

- Prompt: Begin with your prompt, capturing the essence of your desired outcome, no matter the complexity.

- Create: Codia AI processes your prompt using state-of-the-art AI, translating it into professional wireframes enriched with relevant content.

- Optimize: Refine your design with ease. Swap blocks, drag-and-drop elements, and edit to perfection, all within the familiar environment of Figma.


Elevate your design workflow with Codia AI DesignGen and transform your design ideation into stunning, responsive UIs effortlessly. Welcome to the new era of design with Codia AI.

accepted.name: Codia.AI
accepted.description: Anything to Design, Anything to Code.

plugins.tagline: Design with a prompt. Create without limits.

plugins.name: Split Vectors
plugins.description:
Tired of copying vector parts to customize them?

Try this plugin to speedup your work!


You can Split Vectors:


‚û° by Fills. Select Vector with more than one fill region. Regions with different colors are also supported.

‚û° by Shapes. Select a vector with more than one separate shape inside.

‚û° by Segments. Select a vector with more than one segment inside.


‚û° Enable / Disable Autofix feature. If enabled the plugin will try to create all possible unique fill regions or shapes.


Artwork inspired by:

üñº Kazimir Malevich, Spotrsmeny, 1931

üñº Kazimir Malevich, Suprematist composition, 1915-1916

üñº Wassily Kandinsky, Composition VIII, 1923


Sources: https://github.com/neelts/figma-split-vectors


Subscribe to updates, discuss and report bugs in Telegram:

https://t.me/nfigma


Dedicated to my beloved wife, Sofia üíñ

plugins.name: Blossom
plugins.description:
Bring user research to where the work happens


Drag and drop playable video embeds from the Blossom plugin as editable video cards, presentation slides, and sticky notes inside both Figma and FigJam.


See how the user research team at Figma uses Blossom in Figma‚Äôs office hours.


Key Features:

  • Sync your recorded Zoom meetings and notes to Blossom.
  • Upload your user research into Blossom and have it transcribed in minutes.
  • Create clips inside Blossom and drag and drop into Figma and FigJam.
  • Embed media directly into Figma or FigJam from industry leading platforms such as YouTube, Loom, Chorus, Cloudapp, Google Drive, Vimeo, Twitter and many more!
  • Invite your entire team to your Blossom workspace participate in research.
  • Curate your clips into playable highlight reels to captivate your stakeholders and teammates.
  • Add video to your Figma presentations and publish via shareable links.


Follow the steps below or watch the tutorial:

  1. Install the Blossom plugin for Figma / FigJam.
  2. Sign up for a free trial of Blossom.
  3. Import research recordings from the plugin or your Blossom workspace.
  4. Create clips from your recordings
  5. Drag and drop your embeds, clips, or reels from the Blossom plugin into any Figma canvas or FigJam board.


Get in touch

Blossom is expanding everyday. Have a question or idea for us? Send it over to: team@tryblossom.io.

accepted.name: Aaron Veale
accepted.description: Co-Founder / Storyteller: Who loves user research and building products and climbing mountains.

plugins.tagline: Bring user research to where the work happens

plugins.name: Writer for Figma
plugins.description:
Writer is the full-stack generative AI platform for enterprises. We empower your entire organization to accelerate growth, increase productivity, and ensure compliance.


Writer transforms work by delivering high-quality outputs that are accurate, compliant, and on-brand. Our platform consists of Writer-built LLMs, a Knowledge Graph that connects our models to your internal data sources, AI guardrails to enforce your rules, a flexible application layer, and an ecosystem of robust APIs and integrations. 


Writer for Figma puts the power of generative AI in your hands, no matter where you work. 



Work faster with generative AI 

Make open-ended requests to Writer right from Figma. You can request Writer to generate tool tips, draft error messages, brainstorm CTA copy, and much more. If you need help with a phrase, you can have Writer rewrite the text until it‚Äôs just right. When you‚Äôre ready to use the output, you can copy the text or click the ‚Äúinsert‚Äù button to add it to straight into FIgma. 


Keep your work compliant and on-brand

Writer for Figma doesn‚Äôt just identify and fix grammar, spelling, and punctuation errors, it also gives you ‚Äåjust-right suggestions for clarity, brevity, and inclusivity. Stay compliant and on-brand with a custom, automated style guide that incorporates your terms and accounts for your legal, regulatory, an brand rules. 


Reuse approved language

Keep everyone‚Äôs work consistent and correct with snippets, your set of shortcuts to commonly-used, pre-approved messaging, product, and UX copy. Call up a snippet when you‚Äôre in Figma and access the text you need from where you work.

accepted.name: Writer
accepted.description: AI-driven copyediting for teams that care about content.

plugins.tagline: Writer | Clear, consistent, on-brand copy | Checks grammar + spelling

plugins.name: JSON to Figma
plugins.description:
An easy way to use real data in Figma.

The plugin can parse local or JSON files from a URL link. You can populate any layers with text or images.


üí° Features:

  • Load local files and fetch from URL
  • Fetch images
  • Supported formats JPG, PNG, WEBP, SVG, GIF
  • Parsing JSON files with any amount of nested levels
  • Flexible keys selection
  • Populate in random order
  • Select any ranges from JSON file
  • Ability to skip layers
  • Remember user settings and JSON using clientStorage
  • Custom URL for your own proxy


üìö Documentation:

https://pavellaptev.notion.site/JSON-to-Figma-e4f79e250b54413ba5797c1d4a806070


üé• Video Tutorial:

https://youtube.com/watch?v=OO2yeeNuj7A&si=EnSIkaIECMiOmarE


ü§ô Feedback:

Please if you have any troubles with the plugin or ideas how I could improve the plugin.

plugins.name: Higherframer
plugins.description:
Take your high fidelity screens on a trip back in time by converting them into wireframes! Simply select a screen, adjust the settings to your liking, then convert away!


Why?

You may be looking to present a feature at a high-level, but don't want your audience to get hung up on visual details. Or perhaps you're working on enhancing an existing feature, and want to get a solid foundation for wireframing your ideas!


Feedback and bugs

Shoot me an email at j.w.fajnor@gmail.com!


A few credits

Thank you to Carlos Baez, Young Sun, and Chris Kark for helping me to conceive this tool!

plugins.name: Confetti Genie
plugins.description:
Generate random confetti pattern on your canvas.

It works with frame layers. Select the amount of confetti you want to add to selected frames and click 'Generate'.


Workflow

  1. Run the plugin
  2. Select target frames
  3. Select density of confetti you want to generate
  4. Select one or more confetti elements using checkboxes. By default all the boxes would be selected
  5. Add colors of your choice to the palette or leave as it is if you prefer random colors
  6. Generate Confetti using selected colors or random colors by clicking 'Generate' action buttons

accepted.description: Designer

plugins.name: Twitter Emojis by Iconduck
plugins.description:
This is the Iconduck Figma Plugin for Twitter Emojis: the MIT-licensed emoji library built by Twitter.


The 3,360 emojis included in this set can be used for both personal and commercial purposes, and are especially useful when used in your Figma design for brand consistency.


These emojis (or icons depending on what word you use) are used by Twitter on twitterÔªø.com, including in tweets (when people embed emojis), profile pages and threads.


Plugin features:

  • Drag and drop any icons or emojis
  • Search through them all instantly
  • Click any icon to add it your design


Categories included:

This Twitter Emojis plugin for Figma includes emojis from the following categories:

  • Smileys & Emotion
  • People & Body (or bodies)
  • Animals & Nature
  • Food & Drink
  • Travel & Places
  • Activities
  • Objects
  • Symbols (like math, numbers, letters, etc.)
  • Flags


Coming soon:

  • Save your favorite Twitter Bootstrap Icons
  • View your search history
  • View your embed history

plugins.name: Uizard
plugins.description:
Currently in Beta


Export your Figma designs to Uizard and continue your project seamlessly within an easy-to-use, drag-and-drop editor.


Advance your design with Uizard‚Äôs powerful AI features or work collaboratively with your team in real-time.


  • Generate new screens from text prompts
  • Import screenshots and transform them into editable designs
  • Switch the fidelity of your projects with wireframe mode
  • Handoff your designs in React or CSS code


How to use the Figma to Uizard plugin


  1. Log into Figma and open up a new/existing project.
  2. Open the resources tab in the top navigation bar, or use the ‚Äòshift+I‚Äô shortcut.
  3. Click the ‚Äòplugin‚Äô option, and search for Uizard. Selecting it will open the plugin window in the editor.
  4. Select the elements you want to export to Uizard, and use the copy button in the plugin window.
  5. Manually open a Uizard project in a new tab, and paste the elements into the Uizard editor.

plugins.name: Health Icons by Iconduck
plugins.description:
This is the Iconduck Figma Plugin for Health Icons: 1,032 free CC0-licensed icons, used for healthcare and medical related needs.

 

It includes:

  • 1,032 free health and medical related icons
  • CC0-licensed icons
  • Perfect for commercial and personal projects
  • No attribution required


Icons include the following groupings:

  • Blood types
  • Body parts (eg. brain, arm, bacteria, etc.)
  • Health and medical conditions (eg. fever, deaf, back pain, etc.)
  • Medical devices (eg. cast, bed net, etc.)
  • Diagnostic icons (eg. HIV test, etc).
  • Emotions (eg. angry, calm, confused, etc.)
  • Family related icons and graphics (eg. condom, sperm, contraceptive, etc.)
  • Medication icons (eg. pills, etc.)
  • Pregnancy / fetus states (eg. 24 weeks, etc.)
  • Places (eg. church, hospital, etc.)
  • Shapes
  • Specialties (eg. endocrinology, geriatrics, etc.)
  • Vehicles (eg. helicopter, ambulance, etc.)


They're super useful for medical / health related projects, startups, designs and companies.


This plugin will evolve over time, as this is just the first release by Iconduck.

 

Please leave feedback and ideas in the comments üôÉ

plugins.name: Lineicons
plugins.description:
Lineicons is a comprehensive pack of professionally designed free & premium UI icons crafted for designers and developers. This plugin is intended to ease your efforts.


So you can access our entire library without downloading or manually adding them to the Figma design file.


Additionally, Lineicons supports both SVG and icon font formats, giving you flexibility in how you use the icons in your projects.


Lineicons Features

  1. 30,000+ Free and Premium SVG icons
  2. Line (Regular/Light) and Fill Icon Variations
  3. High Legibility and Handcrafted Icons
  4. Universal Packages: - SVG, Icon Font, React, and More
  5. Free Icon CDN for All
  6. 60+ Unique Icon Categories
  7. Crafted for Designers and Developers


Useful Links

  1. Website
  2. Icons
  3. Lineicons Pro
  4. Lineicons on GitHub
  5. Free Figma File


Search, Explore, Insert Customize, | Seamless Access to All Icons

This plugin is easy to use and allows you to quickly find the icon you're looking for by simply typing in a keyword or phrase.


Once you've found the right icon, you can easily insert it into your design project. Our vector format ensures that the icon can be resized without losing its quality, making it adaptable to any design need. Whether you need a large icon for a hero image or a small icon for a button, Lineicons has you covered.


And if you need to customize an icon to better suit your project's needs, our icons are fully editable. You can change the colors, stroke width, and even modify the shapes to create a unique design that perfectly fits your brand's identity. With our customizable icons, the possibilities are endless.


High-quality and Highly Legible Icons Pack

Lineicons icons strike the perfect balance between aesthetics and functionality, ensuring that they not only look great but are also highly legible. This makes them a versatile choice for a wide range of applications, from web design to coding and beyond. With Lineicons, you can trust that your icons will not only enhance the visual appeal of your projects but also provide a seamless user experience.


30000+ Free and Premium Essential UI Icons (+monthly new icons)

Our collection boasts over 30000+ professionally designed free and premium icons, spanning a wide range of categories and themes. From business and food to technology and drink, everyday objects to marketing and communication, we've got you covered. With a variety of unique icons representing over 40 different categories, you're sure to find the perfect icon for your project. Our icons are thoughtfully designed to be both aesthetically pleasing and highly functional, ensuring that they meet the diverse needs of our users.


Multiple Variations: Line (Regular, Light) and Fill Icons

At present, our icons come in three different variations: line (regular/light) and fill. However, we are constantly expanding our library and will soon be introducing additional variations, including duotone. Stay tuned for updates!


Powerful On-site Icon Customizer

With our on-site icon editor, you have the power to customize our icons to your heart's content. From changing the size and color to experimenting with different variations, you can tailor the icons to suit your specific needs. Once you're happy with the result, simply download the icon in scalable SVG format, making it easy to use in any web-based or design application. This means that you can seamlessly integrate your custom icons into any project, without having to worry about compatibility issues.


Free CDN for All

We understand how important it is for developers to have quick and easy access to icon fonts. That's why we offer a free Content Delivery Network (CDN) service specifically designed for our icon fonts. With our CDN, you can seamlessly load icons onto your website from the nearest server, ensuring fast and efficient delivery to your users. Simply include the CDN URL in your site header, and you're good to go!
plugins.tagline: 30k+ Essential Icons for UI Design - Line, Fill, Regular and Light SVG Icons

plugins.name: Auto Documentation
plugins.description:
With one click, this plugin documents all of the color and font styles for you.


Color documentation

Documents all of the color styles defined in your file and puts them into an adjustable component. You can create your own template or use the auto-generated one. It outputs the following fields:


  • Color name
  • Color HEX value
  • Color RGB value


Font documentation

Documents all of your font styles defined in your file and puts them into an adjustable component. You can create your own template or use the auto-generated one. It outputs the following fields:


  • Preview text (Options: text, font name, font name + text )
  • Font name
  • Font family
  • Font weight
  • Font size
  • Font line height
  • Font letter spacing


Variable documentation

Documents all of your local variables. Adjust the styling by using the provided components


If you are happy with the plugin, feel free to buy me a coffee ‚òïÔ∏è

plugins.name: Parrot - localization, Language Translation, no lorem ipsum - Translator, i18n, l10n html, global
plugins.description:
Try out Gleef


Parrot works as intended but we don't have the capacity to improve Parrot at the moment. The Gleef team's goal is to build a better Parrot with a full team behind them.


Parrot remains working as is. Nothing is shutting down, everything runs locally in your Figma file.


---


Parrot simplifies the translation management process right within Figma. If you deal with multilingual design projects and want to streamline your translation workflow, this plugin is for you! 


Key Features:


Design in Different Languages: Create and manage multiple language versions of your designs within your Figma file. Assign unique message to design elements and update them directly within Figma. Say goodbye to swiching interfaces for text and translation managment - all right within figma.


Machine Translations: Translate your designs with one click using our built-in machine translations. The first 100 translations are included for free, and additional translations can be purchased on demand. Save time and ensure accuracy with quick and efficient machine-generated translations.


Import from i18Next, Android and iOS: Seamlessly import existing messages from Android and iOS projects or i18Next JSON format to jumpstart your localization efforts.


Export with Ease: Effortlessly export your translated content to Android and iOS projects for a smooth handoff to developers. i18Next and CLI support is also coming soon!


How It Works:


Run Parrot:

Open Parrot within your Figma environment.


Select a Frame:

Choose the Figma frame you want to design for a different language.


Choose the Language:

Select the desired language from Parrot's intuitive interface.


Instant Text Swap:

Witness the magic as Parrot instantly swaps all text layers in the selected frame to the chosen language. Effortlessly visualize your design in various languages without the need for manual translation.


Message Naming:

Assign unique message names to each text layer, providing clarity and organization to your translation efforts.


Reuse Across Frames:

Streamline your workflow by reusing named messages across multiple frames. Parrot ensures consistency and efficiency in managing multilingual designs.


Export for Handover:

Easily export your translated content, complete with assigned message names, for a seamless handover to developers. Parrot facilitates collaboration and accelerates the localization process.


On-Demand Translations:

103107.description:
Try out Gleef


Parrot works as intended but we don't have the capacity to improve Parrot at the moment. The Gleef team's goal is to build a better Parrot with a full team behind them.


Parrot remains working as is. Nothing is shutting down, everything runs locally in your Figma file.


---


Parrot simplifies the translation management process right within Figma. If you deal with multilingual design projects and want to streamline your translation workflow, this plugin is for you! 


Key Features:


Design in Different Languages: Create and manage multiple language versions of your designs within your Figma file. Assign unique message to design elements and update them directly within Figma. Say goodbye to swiching interfaces for text and translation managment - all right within figma.


Machine Translations: Translate your designs with one click using our built-in machine translations. The first 100 translations are included for free, and additional translations can be purchased on demand. Save time and ensure accuracy with quick and efficient machine-generated translations.


Import from i18Next, Android and iOS: Seamlessly import existing messages from Android and iOS projects or i18Next JSON format to jumpstart your localization efforts.


Export with Ease: Effortlessly export your translated content to Android and iOS projects for a smooth handoff to developers. i18Next and CLI support is also coming soon!


How It Works:


Run Parrot:

Open Parrot within your Figma environment.


Select a Frame:

Choose the Figma frame you want to design for a different language.


Choose the Language:

Select the desired language from Parrot's intuitive interface.


Instant Text Swap:

Witness the magic as Parrot instantly swaps all text layers in the selected frame to the chosen language. Effortlessly visualize your design in various languages without the need for manual translation.


Message Naming:

Assign unique message names to each text layer, providing clarity and organization to your translation efforts.


Reuse Across Frames:

Streamline your workflow by reusing named messages across multiple frames. Parrot ensures consistency and efficiency in managing multilingual designs.


Export for Handover:

Easily export your translated content, complete with assigned message names, for a seamless handover to developers. Parrot facilitates collaboration and accelerates the localization process.


On-Demand Translations:

Utilize the power of machine translations with just one click. The initial 100 translations are complimentary, and additional translations can be acquired on demand. Ensure a rapid and cost-effective approach to achieving a globalized design.

plugins.name: Component Replacer
plugins.description:
A simple plugin which helps you to replace any selection with components or instances


How to use:

Select any frame, object, component or an instance and chose from the list of components in the plugin to replace it with.


Note: The selection will be removed from the document after replacing with the new component/instance unless the "Preserve Selection" option is enabled from the settings pane.


The plugin has three configurable settings currently :


‚¶ø Preserve Selection : When enabled, the selection will not be removed from the document instead it stays below the replaced component/instance hidden


‚¶ø Replace with Instance : When enabled, the selection will be replaced with an instance instead of a cloned component


‚¶ø Show current page components: When enabled, the plugin lists only the components from the current page


Roadmap:

[x] Search components in the list

[ ] Visually represent the component heirarchy if the naming conventions are defined

accepted.description: Dude who likes to design and code stuff

plugins.name: Font Swap
plugins.description:
Welcome to Font Swap, your new ally in Figma for seamless font transitions. Our plugin lets you change fonts while preserving your styles and weights, all in a few clicks.


üí° How to use Font Swap?

  1. Choose your text layers. You can either select all elements in your page (with ‚åò+A or Ctrl+A) or pick a specific frame with the text layers you want to modify.
  2. Activate the Font Swap Plugin.
  3. Pick your new font. Font Swap will handle the rest, replacing your old font while keeping the styles and weights the same.


üéØ Key Features:

  1. Fast and efficient font search
  2. Replace mixed text
  3. Find and replace missing fonts
  4. Preservation of font styles and weights
  5. Visible fonts style
  6. All new font Suggestions üü¢


‚ú® Upcoming Updates:

  1. Fix text style de-attach issue
  2. Replace multiple fonts at once


Font Swap is a premium Figma plugin designed to streamline your design process.


With Font Swap, you get a comprehensive overview of your used font families and styles. This allows you to experiment with a new font in your existing designs without disrupting your styles. It's the perfect tool for a major redesign, or when you want to see how a fresh font could elevate your design, without losing sight of your styles.


Got ideas on how we can improve Font Swap? We'd love to hear from you. Feel free to drop us an email hello@kalki.design. Thank you!"

accepted.description: Hi I'm a UX designer. During weekdays I'm working at EY and on weekends I'm build design resources for our community to thrive. Join me on twitter (X)

plugins.name: Gradient Morph
plugins.description:
Using random noise and morphing colors you can generate unique looking images.


Select a frame or rectangle and open the plugin.


play with the controls to get your unique look.


  1. You can pause and resume the animation for more control.
  2. You can press and hold on the canvas to rotate the camera.
  3. You can enable transparency to make place for some other design element.


Press Generate image when you think the canvas looks good, and it will copy it to your frame.


App Version

There is also a web app version that you can use outside of Figma.

https://gradient-morph.leonradley.com


Web Component

There is also a minimal web component that you can then use on your homepage to get the exact same morphing colors, but live!

https://www.npmjs.com/package/@leon/gradient-morph


Feedback

You can find more info and you can send feedback on this github repo

https://github.com/leon/gradient-morph-feedback

plugins.name: Quick table
plugins.description:
Paste CSV, choose your preferred table layouts and generate a clean table in seconds. Smart cell selection maximizes styling freedom without the need for repetitive clicks.


25s Demo: https://twitter.com/kakax114/status/1559070703219273731?t=-NyaGkeouvsfQswkYxhkKw


üî•Get started

  1. Copy your source data from CSV, Excel, Google Sheet, and cmd/ctrl + v to the first text box.
  2. Pick Column or Row, it will decide the Autolayout direction to group the cells.
  3. Create table. (Done! To get the most out of Quick table, dive into the following steps üëáü§ø)
  4. Select All cells, then head to the Figma panel to customize the table look & feel, such as vertical or horizontal paddings, underline borders, colors etc.
  5. Toggle Text mode, allow you to drill into text layers of the selected cells, where you can style the font type, font size, and resizing options (eg truncation).
  6. Select Top header, and apply a different style to the table header. You can also use the ‚Üë and ‚Üì buttons to step through each row, ie design a zebra stripe.
  7. Select Side header, style the vertical header, or more commonly to style each column, use ‚Üê and ‚Üí buttons to traverse. Useful for changing column widths, or right-align number columns.


‚úÖSummary

  • It's always been a challenge select table cells against your Autolayout direction. Quick Table makes duplicating rows easy for a column-based table and selecting columns on a row-based table is a breeze.
  • Quick Table is a CLEAN plugin, it only creates necessary layers, no pre-defined styles. Also, it's front-end-only processing, developer will never get your data.



Enjoy!



-------------


‚öôÔ∏èChange log

Bug fix on row select - 12 Aug

plugins.name: Renamed
plugins.description:
Rename, transform, and organize the layer names of the entire page, a selection, or a certain layer type.

 

Find & rename

Find and rename a specific layer(s).


  1. Search for one word, combination of words or individual character.
  2. For a strict match, tick the checkbox Case sensitive.
  3. Leave the Rename input blank to remove the search criteria.
  4. Edit Apply to section to skip the renaming of particular layers. The inner layers of omitted items will also be skipped.

 

Transform case

Modify the layer(s) name case.

 

  1. Pick one of the 13 types of font cases. To name a few, Title Case, Sentence case, Header-Case, PascalCase, camelCase etc.
  2. Use No case to reset the font case.
  3. Edit Apply to section to skip the transformation of particular layers. The inner layers of omitted items will also be skipped.


Clean

Tidy up the layer(s) name case.


  1. Select to remove all special characters, digits or extra spaces.
  2. Edit Apply to section to skip the transformation of particular layers. The inner layers of omitted items will also be skipped.

accepted.description: Frontend developer obsessed with Figma plugins üß†üí°‚ú®

This is a super-large icon library that's unique, in that the 2,580 icons are full color. They're bright and consistently designed, which can be super useful for user interface libraries design systems.

plugins.name: Figma Charts
plugins.description:
Charts in Figma Simplified, Instantly Customize, Visualize, Implement Charts Directly within Figma.


Integrate the most popular JavaScript chart libraries into your designs to visualize, customize, and implement charts directly within Figma.


  1. Seamless Integration: Integrate popular chart libraries directly into your Figma designs.
  2. Real-time Preview: Instantly visualize how your charts will appear within the design.
  3. Customization Options: Easily customize chart styles, colors, and configurations.
  4. Library Compatibility: Support for well-known chart libraries such as Google Charts, (Highcharts, Apexcharts, and D3.js ~ TODO).
  5. Interactive Editing: Edit and adjust chart parameters interactively within the Figma canvas.
  6. Developer-friendly Designs: Ensure designs align perfectly with developers' capabilities for smoother implementation.
  7. Time-saving: Streamline the design process by eliminating the need for manual adjustments during development.
  8. Accurate Representation: Design with confidence, knowing your charts will translate accurately into the final product.
  9. Collaboration Enhancements: Facilitate better collaboration between design and development teams.
  10. Continuous Updates: Stay up-to-date with new features and library integrations to enhance your design workflow.


Love using FigmaCharts, the most practical charting plugin for designers? It helps you create beautiful and efficient charts with ease!


Here's how you can contribute:


A quick and easy way to show your appreciation for FigmaCharts is by buying me a coffee. This one-time contribution fuels my passion and helps maintain the development of the plugin.


https://www.buymeacoffee.com/lucksy


Cheers!

plugins.name: Daily Planner
plugins.description:
"Daily Planner" is a powerful Figma plugin designed to create custom, detailed daily timelines for planning purposes.


Features include:

  1. Custom Date Range: Set your planning period by specifying the start and end dates. The plugin will generate a daily timeline for the given period.
  2. Skip Weekends Option: The plugin automatically skips weekends, focusing on weekdays for your planning needs.
  3. Weekday Indicator: Each day is labeled with its corresponding day of the week, helping you stay organized.
  4. Week Separator: A thicker line is drawn at the beginning of each week, making it easy to visually differentiate between weeks.


The Daily Planner is a simple yet effective tool for visualizing your schedule, keeping track of deadlines, or mapping out project timelines.

plugins.name: MockupMirror
plugins.description:
Mirror and sync any screen in your file to create user flows without creating more versions of content. Keep a single source of truth.

 

Sound interesting? Try it now in MockupMirror Playground...

https://www.figma.com/community/file/977797826186922410/MockupMirror-Playground

 

How to Mirror like a pro:

  1. Select any frame you want to mirror.
  2. Click +Mirror to capture a PNG image of the source.
  3. Paste Mirrors into your designs, on any page in the file.
  4. When you change the source design, click Sync All to update Mirrors.

 

What can MockupMirror do?

MockupMirror allows you to retain a single source of truth for your designs and keep everything in sync. It allows you to capture designs as PNG files that sync. We call these ‚ÄòMirrors‚Äô. Jump instantly from Mirror to source for quick editing. Keep everything up-to-date with one-click sync.

 

Why did we create MockupMirror?

Complicated user experience flows and information architecture maps require designers to reproduce numerous identical versions of the same designs. Scattered instances are hard to manage and can fall out of sync with the original design. MockupMirror simplifies the design process by capturing PNG images of your designs to paste into flows anywhere in the file. Use hyperlinks to jump from image to source for quick editing. Sync changes with one click.
